summary: A story about the clash between personal desires, solidarity and tolerance in a Danish commune in the 1970s.
cast: Fares Fares|Ulrich Thomsen|Trine Dyrholm|Lars Ranthe|Julie Agnete Vang|Mads Reuther|Magnus Millang|Ole Dupont|Helene Reingaard Neumann|Lise Koefoed|Martha Sofie Wallstrøm Hansen|Ulver Skuli Abildgaard|Oliver Methling Søndergaard|Jacob Højlev Jørgensen|Rasmus Lind Rubin|Ida Maria Vinterberg|Sebastian Grønnegaard Milbrat|Anne Gry Henningsen|Morten Rose|Jytte Kvinesdal|Adam Fischer|Claus Sprotte Kofod|Sigga Eythorsdottir|Sanny Jakobsen|Mikael Kærsgaard|Jesper Hyllegaard|Henrik Strube|Erling Agergaard|Morten Feldt
title: La comuna
